docs.abstract: The director behind the Christian-themed "Courageous" talks about moviemaking as ministry.
docs.snippet: The director behind the Christian-themed "Courageous" talks about moviemaking as ministry.

docs.lead_paragraph: Many directors think of their work as a kind of religion, but few actually refer to their production company as "a moviemaking ministry" -- unless of course they are the people behind Sherwood Pictures. The Georgia-based Sherwood Baptist Church has released four films, and its latest, "Courageous," has shown once again that it has a way with Christian audiences.
docs.abstract: The director behind the Christian-themed "Courageous" talks about moviemaking as ministry.
docs.snippet: The director behind the Christian-themed "Courageous" talks about moviemaking as ministry.
